content.new:
Gazebo 1.9 / ROS Hydro / Ubuntu 12.04

When I toggle the "shadows" property under the Scene category off and then on again, it causes the Gazebo gui to segfault.

When I toggle the "shadows" property under the Scene category off and then on again, it causes Gazebo to segfault.
